title: Consensus Mechanisms
script: Different consensus mechanisms like Proof-of-Work (PoW), Proof-of-Stake (PoS), and Zero-Knowledge-Rolling Hash ensure blockchain systems reach agreement efficiently. PoW uses energy, PoS relies on stake, and ZK-Rolling Hash is faster and reduces trust issues.
visuals_description: Visual representations of these consensus mechanisms with each system highlighted in bold to emphasize their unique approaches.
